name: Chicken Fight Island
description:
You are a chicken on an island being attacked by evil Chick-Fil-A cows. You must peck them to defeat them!

Controls:

Up/W - Move forward

Down/S - Move backward

Left/A - Turn left

Right/D - Turn right

Space/Click - Attack/Peck
